full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA MNGA' GSOL BYA TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS RDZOGS LDAN SPRIN GYI SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг):
@002A *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS LA MNGA' GSOL BYA TSUL 'DOD DGU'I CHAR 'BEBS RDZOGS LDAN SPRIN GYI SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, THI BO SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN
'DZIN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
` SVA STI, RGYAL PO CHEN PO NGAL BSOS GANG, ,GANG ZHIG TSUL MTHONG SPYOD PA BZANG, ,BZANG PO'I MCHOD 'PHRIN YAN LAG MCHOG ,MCHOG
GI SKYE BO'I DON DU BRKOS, ,BRKOS PA'I DGE BAS 'DUL BA GSUM DANG DE'I MTHUN RKYEN KUN TU 'PHEL BAR SHOG ,'PHAGS PA'I NOR RGYAS ME YOS ZLA 12 TSES LA BRIS PA DGE , ,,
